name: Linda: in the magic world
description:
Linda: in the magic world V1.1

This game is about a little girl who fell into an amazing and dangerous world! Help Linda go through all the levels, collect all the necessary crystals to get home.

  • Main keyboard controls:
    ← → - movement.
    ↓ - squat.
    Z key - Fast Run.
    Space bar - jump.
    P key- Pause.
    M key - Change music.
    R key - Restart.
  • Additional keyboard controls:
    A, D key- moving left and right.
    W key - jump.
    S key - Squat.
    Rshift (right Shift) - Fast run.
    P key- Pause.
    M key - Change music.
    R key - Restart.

At the moment, the game is in development. Planned release for mobile platforms, support for multiple languages and support for the joystick. I also need your support! :3

I would also be glad to people who want to take part in the project.

My mail is appdurov@gmail.com
